dmca.title: Notice of Copyright Infringement by boy-kiss.com (64.5.52.206)

-----Original Message-----
From: Colin Snover [mailto:abuse@y-hosting.net] 
Posted At: Tuesday, August 22, 2006 10:53 AM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: Notice of Copyright Infringement by boy-kiss.com
(64.5.52.206)
Subject: Notice of Copyright Infringement by boy-kiss.com (64.5.52.206)


Greetings.

The Web site located at http://www.boy-kiss.com/ (which resolves to
64.5.52.206) is illegally using and distributing copyrighted material
from several of my clients.

Please note that for links located at http://yaoi.y-gallery.net a login
is required. We have created a login for your convenience:

Username: copyrightinfringement
Password: theplanet

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials
described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the
copyright owner, its agent, or the law. I swear, under penalty of
purgery, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I
am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of
an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

If further information is required, please contact me at this email
address. Otherwise, please remove the offending works immediately.

Thank you for your time,

--
Colin Snover
y!hosting Abuse
